mapper.select: SELECT ec.id, ec.price, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum, ecd.description AS description, ec.title AS title, esone.title AS oneSubject, estwo.title AS twoSubject, et.`name` AS teacherName FROM edu_course AS ec LEFT JOIN ( edu_course_description AS ecd ) ON ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher AS et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id INNER JOIN edu_subject AS esone ON ec.subject_parent_id = esone.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject AS estwo ON ec.subject_id = estwo.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
